definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: lower, lowest ;— abs. ´[[תּ]]: Jos 16:3 +, fs. [[תּׂנׇה]]- Is 22:9 +, fpl. [[תּׂנׁת]]- Ez Eze 42:5, Eze 42:6;—lower, Is 22:9 ´[[הַבְּרֵכָה הַתּ]]: the lower pool (in Jerus.), of pavement and gate of outer (lower). temple-court Ez Eze 40:18, Eze 40:19 (l. [[הַתַּחְתּוֹן]] ´[[השּׁ]]:), of lower ledge ([[עֲזׇרְה]]) of altar, Eze 43:14; of the lowest of the three stories of side-chambers surrounding the temple, 1Ki 6:6 ´[[הַיׇּחוּעַ הַתּ]]:, + v:1Ki 6:8 (v. [[תִּיכוֹן]]), Ez Eze 41:7 (read [[וּמִן]] for [[וְבֵן]]), Eze 42:5, Eze 42:6; in place-name, ´[[בֵּית־חׂרוֹן תּ]]: Jos 16:3, Jos 18:13, 1Ki 9:17 (‖ 2Ch 8:5 ´[[הַתּ]]:), ´[[בֵּית־חׂרוֹן הַתּ]]: 1Ch 7:24 2Ch 8:5.
